ygData.subject: Re: money
ygData.msgSnippet: I love that idea - I do something like that for guildmates when they join, its kinda like a house warming present - though I ve always given them away free.
ygData.messageBody:
I love that idea - I do something like that for guildmates when they
join, its kinda like a house warming present - though I've always
given them away free.

What server are you on? How do you adverstise them? I have heard
stories of bake sales but thats before my time (and before /bazaar)

As a Shaman I spend some time in POK offereing buffs for donations,
usually can make a little bit that way. Even at level 9 you can get
some money with SOW.




--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Jenn Perry" <rougejenna@h...>
wrote:
> I make money baking. I came up with an idea of a meal in a bag I
buy a
> small 4 slot bag put a stack of patty melts and a stack of dessert
and a
> stack of wine, milk or water and top it off with a flower. It is
quick and
> easy and they sell like HOT cakes. Also as you get higher in
baking you can
> make things that have a proc value like justice fruit pies that
raise your
> states and halas meat pies.
>
> Those that have 100kpp pay for it on site they buy their money I
think that
> is cheating and I won't waste that kind of money just to buy an
over priced
> weapon or pievce of armor
>
> Rougejenna <therris-thule server>
